name: Space Invader (RRT)
description:
This is the first game I have actually tried to complete. I made this game in one day so if there's problems you'll know why.

Controls:

W/S - Up Down

Esc - Pause(you must hold down esc to pause once you let go on esc the game resumes)

I hope you guys like this game!

Discord: Vortex#2563

Youtube: Double R Tropical

When you die, The game closes.
